meanings.definition: To attack or shoot at with a rapid discharge of firearms.
meanings.sent1: The soldiers were fusillading the enemy camp with their guns.
meanings.sent2: The police were fusillading warning shots to disperse the crowd.

meanings.sent4: The hailstorm was fusillading the roof, creating a loud noise.
meanings.sent5: The fireworks were fusillading across the night sky, lighting up the darkness.
